price: 7. Munaafiqhiin kinni: Yallih farmoytih xaqul yan marah (muhaajiriin kinnuk) masruf maaciinaay maskamina ittem usun fixixxi iyyaanam fanah, qaranwaa kee baaxó kadnooniiy quusik ken addal enni ittam dubuk Yalli Ie, kinnih immay munaafiqhiin woh mataaxigaay edde maradda.
arabic: هُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ لَا تُنفِقُواْ عَلَىٰ مَنۡ عِندَ رَسُولِ ٱللَّهِ حَتَّىٰ يَنفَضُّواْۗ وَلِلَّهِ خَزَآئِنُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ لَا يَفۡقَهُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: humu alladhīna yaqūlūna lā tunfiqū ʿalā man ʿinda rasūli al-lahi ḥattā yanfaḍḍū walillahi khazāinu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi walākinna al-munāfiqīna lā yafqahūna
